description: It is too dark to see anything, but you smell sludge nearby.
tip: Use samurai.feel() to see what is in front. If it is None, walk; otherwise attack. Remember, you can only do one action per turn.
clue: Add an if/else condition with `space = samurai.feel()` and `if space is None:` to decide whether to samurai.attack() or samurai.walk().
